title.rendered: CISCO joins hands with Smile Foundation to provide healthcare and education to the underprivileged

content.rendered:
CISCO joins hands with Smile Foundation to provide healthcare and education to the underprivileged

 

CISCO has extended support for Smile Foundation’s Mission Education programme which will benefit 400 underprivileged children in Dharavi, Mumbai. The main focus areas are classroom activities like Classroom Teaching Learning, Computer Classes, English Classes, Progress Assessment of Students etc. and beyond Classroom activities like Exposure Visit, Health Awareness / Check up Programme, Art & craft/music/ dance activities, Physical education activities, Participation at external events, Employee Engagement Programme, Parent Teacher Meeting, Community meetings, Capacity building of project staff / personnel.

In addition, CISCO is also supporting the health initiative of Smile Foundation called Smile on Wheels by providing Primary Healthcare Services to underprivileged communities with special focus on women and children living in the identified Fetri village of Nagpur through 15 Smile Health Camps. Smile Health Camp is a comprehensive and multi-disciplinary approach to render a range of specialized services including gynecological, pediatric services etc. It’s a special initiative to provide healthcare services to meet the specialized health care needs of the marginalized community through standalone camps. Approximately, 3000 beneficiaries will be benefitted from these camps.

Cisco commenced India operations in 1995. There are seven Sales Offices in the region – New Delhi, Mumbai, Bangalore, Chennai, Pune, Kolkata and Hyderabad. The Cisco Global Development Center is in Bangalore and is the largest outside the US. It houses Cisco’s Research and Development (R&D), IT, Services and customer support teams and develops disruptive business models for Cisco to create new go-to-market channels, markets, processes and technologies for emerging markets. The Advanced Global Briefing Center located here showcases Cisco’s latest technology solutions and proof-of-concepts.
